name:
Pokémon™ Alpha Sapphire:
Update
description:
An update for Pokémon™ Alpha Sapphire is now available from Nintendo eShop.

This will update the software to Version 1.4 with the following amendments:

- Various bugs have been fixed in order to provide a smoother gaming experience.

Once the update has been downloaded, it will be installed automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused, and recommend downloading this update to ensure a smooth game experience.

Please note that Pokémon™ Omega Ruby cannot be updated using this data and you have to download the update data for Pokémon™ Omega Ruby separately.
